description: Leo Forte looks sexy in his security guard uniform and spectacles, but his presence is menacing for prisoner Brian Bonds, who is about to undergo 'rehabilitation.' A few more pelvic thrusts are all that's needed to trigger the release of Leo's spooge, which flies out onto Brian's head. Leo leaves, telling Brian he's not through with him yet.
title: The Trustees, Scene #03
